## jx start

Starts a process such as a pipeline

### Synopsis

Starts a process such as a Jenkins pipeline.

```
jx start TYPE [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Start a pipeline
  jx start pipeline foo
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for start
```
